title: Lower Yoke and Headstock Bearings - Bearing Removal

body.body: Lower Yoke and Headstock Bearings - Bearing Removal
Using a suitable drift, evenly and progressively drive the bearing outer races from the frame headstock.
Protect the threads of the lower yoke when using a press or puller as damaged threads may mean replacing the lower yoke completely.
Remove the bearing inner race from the lower yoke using a press or puller.
Note the orientation of the dust seal for installation.
Remove the dust seal from the lower yoke.
